我try to explain in 中文, may be not too good, would you mind? my grand dad 通常叫女病人with the same problem 先見西醫 check 有冇cancer, but 如果冇硬塊,通常唔會係cancer, my grand dad's recipe: 六一 散 just spread on the nibbles, and drink the herbal tea :膽南星二錢,半夏四錢,莪術三錢,三菱三錢,昆布三錢,海藻三錢,川芎三錢,黃蓍三錢,紅花二錢,甘艸三錢.(grand dad 話this is 痰火結塊,呢劑太子都食唔壞), you can try to ask your herbalist-中醫. if it works, let me know.
